description: We`ve worked with both Jason Ridge and Manuel Torres before (Jason and Michael won Best Threesome with Derrick Hanson at this year`s GAYVN`s for Michael Lucas` La Dolce Vita and Manny had his Lucas debut in Encounters 4), but funnily enough neither had done an Audition for us... until now. The two studs pair up in a scene fans will love, with Manny fucking Jason`s brains out!
title: Jason Ridge and Manuel Torres
